The warriors catch up as you’re pinned to the ground. The Piggen are merciless in their beatings and armor is torn away. Blades find armor joints and when knives are ineffective axes are used instead. The sheer amount of power pressing down on Noel is enough to stop any hope of movement before the first of the weapons find home between ribs and into joints. The sky is a blood red of evening and you can see the engines of the Enigmatic Explorer firing as the crew is recovered and makes their escape. They’ll declare their message of your fall until reaching civilization , where it will be circulated to those who need to know. The end comes quickly and Noel does not suffer for long under the primitive Piggen. She has long departed her body by nightfall as the now crucified body is stuck into the ground as a warning by the western gate of the village. Of the armor and weapons once carried, many of the war chiefs among the settlement carried themselves and their soldiers well during the battle, and perhaps in time ways will be found to make the ornate and exotic weapons work again. Tales of the sky warrior who came to the village to bring blood and death, and was beaten back by the heroic Piggen are sung in the mead hall that night , and will be for many weeks and months beyond.
